description: Enum for the different types of project lists

enum.name: MY_PROJECTS
enum.description: Projects visible to the requesting user.

enum.name: MY_CREATED_PROJECTS
enum.description: Projects created by and visible to the requesting user.

enum.name: MY_PARTICIPATED_PROJECTS
enum.description: Projects visible to, but not created by, the requesting user.

enum.name: MY_TEAM_PROJECTS
enum.description: Projects visible to any team the requesting user is a member of.

enum.name: OTHER_USER_PROJECTS
enum.description: Projects visible to the provided user, and also visible to the requesting user.

enum.name: TEAM_PROJECTS
enum.description: Projects visible to the provided team, and also visible to the requesting user.
